resources.string: Sallama? Ka tabbata?
Next
Babu Match
%d users
Wasu mambobin suna amfani da wani mazan version; duk members dole ne hažaka da sabuwar version.
All members dole ne hažaka, wasu suna yin amfani da mazan tura rajista Formats.
Internet babu, duba ka saituna.
Exchange timeout wuce. Za a fara da musayar sake.
Server HTTP Kuskure: %d
Ba daidai ba data samu a exchange. Za a fara da musayar sake.
Don Allah shigar da kyau lamba.
Ka bayar da rahoton wani bambanci a phrases. Za a fara da musayar sake.
A m na %d members ana buƙatar su musanya bayanai.
M data samu a exchange. Za a fara da musayar sake.
Exchange ya bace ake buƙata bayanai.
Dole ne ka zaži daya daga cikin phrases kafin a ci gaba.
Wani ya ruwaito wani bambanci a phrases. Za a fara da musayar sake.
Memory ya yi yawa low don kammala wannan aiki.
Server Message: %s
Babu amsa daga uwar garken.
Timeout jiran wasu gungun \'yan don ƙara bayanai.
User soke uwar garken request.
Select yawan mutanen da suka suna kokarin musanya data tare kuma latsa Ok.

Wannan lambar a kan wannan allon da ake amfani ya halicci na musamman da rukuni na masu amfani. Bitar lambobi a kan duk masu amfani \'fuska, sannan duk masu amfani ya kamata shigar da wannan mafi ƙasƙanci lamba kuma latsa Ok.
Yanzu, dole ne ka dace da daya daga cikin wadannan 3-kalma phrases da dukan masu amfani. Kowane mai amfani dole ne ka zaɓa guda na kowa magana, ka kuma danna Next.
Compare fuska a ranar %s na\'urorin.
Non-English
Wannan lambar da ake amfani ya halicci na musamman da rukuni na masu amfani. Compare, sa\'an nan kuma shigar da lambar mafi ƙasƙanci a tsakanin duk masu amfani.
%d samu abubuwa
Mafi ƙasƙanci
All phones dole dace daya daga cikin 3-kalma phrases. Compare, sa\'an nan kuma sama da daidai da magana.
SafeSlinger Exchange
jiran tabbaci daga dukan \'yan…
jiran duk masu amfani ya shiga…
gina kungiyar key…
neman kasancewa memba…
Ta yaya mutane da yawa masu amfani a kasashen waje?
Grouping
Gaskanta
